about_the_game:
"Come home safe, ok? : ) "

HEAVENSCAPE is a 3D Y2k horror roguelike designed to invoke PC Games from the early 2000s. You play as a character named ANGEL, who is an angel, traveling home from a party at night. Find a path home, meet friends and avoid dangers. Be careful - if your phone's battery runs out, its over...

Explore a randomly generated city filled with unique characters, solve puzzles using your desktop browser, discover hundreds of secrets tucked away in the darkest alleys and abandoned homes and, of course, enjoy a delicious Boyo Boy Burger.

Demo coming soon!!

content_descriptors.notes: HEAVENSCAPE contains strong language, themes of body horror, content describing or alluding to: sexual assault, self-harm, suicide, child death, eating disorders, abuse, violence, kidnapping/abduction, blood, gore, drug use, sexism/misogyny, death, drowning, and gameplay sequences involving chases, bright lights, and sudden movement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce® GTS 250 or better, Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit DirectX compatible sound card
